name: Mystery Manor A Point and Click Adventure
name_original: Mystery Manor A Point and Click Adventure
description:
Welcome to a new adventure! Mystery Manor is here!

One night at the Johnson house, something terrible was about to happen, Mrs Johnson was found dead by her husband. Many years passed without the murderer being found and the case was closed, on learning this, Mr Johnson decides to return to his old house to investigate the crime.

Are you ready to help Mr Johnson?

Who was the murderer?

Why was she killed?

Get involved in this great Point and Click and solve the mystery!

"More than 300,000 downloads of our adventure games" - Magic Frame Studios

Features:
- Based on Point and Click games
-No hidden objects
-Incredible graphics
-Lots of items to collect and puzzles to solve
-Original soundtrack and effects.
-Auto-Save
-Translated into: Spanish-English-Italian-French-German
